sourcesContent:
import { Component, EventEmitter, Output } from '@angular/core'; @Component({ selector: 'cms-header', templateUrl: './header.component.html', styleUrls: ['./header.component.css'], }) export class HeaderComponent { @Output() selectedFeatureEvent = new EventEmitter(); onSelected(selectedEvent: string) { this.selectedFeatureEvent.emit(selectedEvent); } }
